mapper.select: select * from COMMENTS where POSTID = #{postid} order by ID desc
mapper.insert: insert into COMMENTS (POSTID, WRITER, COMMENT_TEXT) values (#{postid}, #{writer}, #{comment_text})
mapper.update: update COMMENTS set COMMENT_TEXT = #{comment_text}, MODIFIED_TIME = systimestamp where ID = #{id}
